ygData.msgSnippet: Following your spark isn t always a bad thing, it should be top of the list. But you need to know how to keep your spark.In the jungle (The mighty jungle just

"Following your spark isn't always a bad thing, it should be top of 
the list. But you need to know how to keep your spark.In the jungle 
(The mighty jungle just kidding) I could've killed you, you forgot 
your spark and panicked. I figure it was the same out here. You 
followed your owl instincs and ran from a predator. You have more 
than an owl ever will. you have scanners, mechanical strength, and a 
computerised brain.We have Beast modes to survive on THIS planet. We 
have bot modes to survive on ANY planet. You've got more spark than 
any bot I've ever known. You just have to realise that you have to 
protect it. Or......

Lunarpines spark was beginning to get the best of him.

..."Or I'll protect it for you."

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::Shadow Wing::
> 
> She stopped. She turned and faced Lunarpine.  she had to admit what 
> she didn't want to admit.
> "I follow my spark.  I follow orders as well."  she sighed,"But my 
> spark is what guides me." She turned around and faced south instead 
> Lunarpine.  "That's why I failed. I followed my spark an not what 
> orders I was given.  I was supposed to scout and recon. Not fight. 
I 
> wanted to prove that I was better than I was. But I found out just 
> how wrong I was. And in running away, I put you in danger. I see 
> myself more as a threat than an asset to the group." She stood 
there 
> looking out across the horizon. She was trying not to cry.
